entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain or snow. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle changing to flurries near noon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 70 gusting to 90 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023
